node.name: The Will
node.rich_text: 2. Will ka seed: "Desire" se hota hai
â€¢ Kisi bhi goal ke liye will tabhi banti hai jab hum uske baare mein: â—‡
ki agar hum waha pahunch gaye to kaisa lagega
kyunki: â—‡ â€œMujhe pata hi nahi kaise waha tak jaaungaâ€ â—‡ â€œPath (rasta) clear nahi haiâ€
: Rasta ka koi fix plan nahi hota
jab tu pehla kadam uthata hai.
ek soch hai jo future ke result ki imagination se paida hoti hai.â€ â€¢ Dar jab justified hota hai: â—‡ Jab jaan khatre mein ho (e.g., accident, fire)
chair pe baitha ho aur coding se darr lag raha ho
hai failure ka â—‡ Abhi to tu
Check kar: Kya tera dar valid hai?

â€¢ Kya tu already pura content dekh chuka hai? âŒ â€¢ Kya tu already master ban gaya hai isme? âŒ â€¢ Kya tu is course mein fail ho gaya hai? âŒ Toh phir dar kis baat ka? Jab kuch shuru hi nahi kiya, to fail hone ka dar kyun?
â€¢ Kai students jo failure se darte hain,
wo hi sabse pehle give up kar dete hain
jab koi subject tough lagta hai. â€¢ Wo kehte hain: â€œMujhse nahi ho raha, chhodo.â€ â€¢ Lekin soch: Kya ye give-up karna
Jisse tu bachna chahta tha, tu usi se haar gaya.
6. Tere paas kya hona chahiye? â†’ Ek Clear Goal
nahi hoga, tu: â—‡ Easily frustrate hoga â—‡ Confuse hoga â—‡ Give up karega â€¢ Lekin agar tera
: â—‡ Har mushkil mein tera dimaag bolega: â€œMujhe waha pahuchna hi hai â€” jo bhi ho jaye.â€
